messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Captain is now a maxiumum level prisoner who must be kept in a very tight and unescapable place.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a swarm of rodents have migrated into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
